Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory187.png'}
{2: 'Strange Commentary', 3: 'What incredible driving skills!'}
{2: 'Strange Commentary', 3: "Unbelievable! They've pulled off an overtake using the gutter technique!"}
{2: 'Strange Commentary', 3: 'Just who is this mysterious "BBBB" racer on the track?!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Don't tell me today's commentators don't even know about the gutter technique?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget sits in the simulation cockpit, disbelieving.'}
{3: "It looks like she's more focused on the commentary than the steering wheel."}
{3: 'To see how things got to this point, we need to look back at what happened earlier.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory187.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Male Student', 3: 'Come closer, folks! Behold my latest masterpiece—the E86 Racing Simulator!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Around him are four cockpit seats, each with its own display. A large monitor is set up in the empty area nearby.'}
{2: 'Male Student', 3: 'Supports four-player races with ultra-realistic simulation!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Male Student', 3: 'The top racer will win the Ultimate Racing Champion Medal of Honor!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Male Student', 3: 'Come and test your skills, folks!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Wow! This looks exciting!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Encouraged by the interest, the host starts explaining the rules with excitement.'}

{2: 'Male Student', 3: "Of course! This is an entire year's worth of work from all twelve members of our club. I can guarantee you won't be disappointed because I am set to join the Science Council one day.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Male Student', 3: 'There are 272 different cars to choose from! You can even race against an F1 car with a tank!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Male Student', 3: 'No guarantee to win, of course.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Male Student', 3: 'And the winner gets the Ultimate Racing Champion Medal of Honor!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Male Student', 3: 'The! Ultimate! Racing! Champion!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Male Student', 3: "It's just a handmade medal from our club with no real prestige, but still!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Male Student', 3: 'That also means this medal is one of a kind—not just in Babylonia, but on Earth and in the entire universe!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: '【kuroname】, I want to try this!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Games are not the same as reality, you know.', 3: '42'}
{2: "You might lose if you're not careful.", 3: '43'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Driving is the one thing nobody can beat me at—even if it's just a game!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Bridget jumps confidently into the cockpit and takes the wheel.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Enter your name... hmm... BBBB!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Watch me win this in one go!', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory187.png'}
{2: 'Strange Commentary', 3: 'After 16 treacherous hairpin turns, only two racers remain on the track!'}
{2: 'Strange Commentary', 3: 'In the first place, we have racer "BBBB", followed by "NoFishMint" in second!'}
{2: 'Strange Commentary', 3: 'The gap between them is widening! It looks like we have our winner!'}
{2: 'Strange Commentary', 3: 'No, wait a minute!'}
{2: 'Strange Commentary', 3: '"NoFishMint" is not done yet! They\'re betting everything on this final straight!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Don't even think about it!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Bridget's hands move in a blur across the controls as the numbers on the dashboard surge higher and higher."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Male Student', 3: 'These readings...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Male Student', 3: "We are almost at our software's limits...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Club Member', 3: 'We are very close.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Beads of sweat roll down the developer's face as he anxiously watches the numbers on the backend display."}
{3: 'This is just a student club project, so the software can barely keep up with Bridget, whose driving skills are out of this world.'}
{3: "Even the Science Council's driving simulator sometimes fails to give Bridget the thrill she craves."}
{2: 'Strange Commentary', 3: 'Here is our winner!'}
{2: 'Male Student', 3: "The system's about to break!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Club Member', 3: "Darn it, don't underestimate our hard work and skills!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'All eyes are glued to the screen as the cars cross the finish line.'}
{2: 'Strange Commentary', 3: 'And the winner is...'}
{2: 'Strange Commentary', 3: 'BBBB!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Male Student', 3: "Phew, it's over.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "The host hands the medal to Bridget looking as if he's just survived a major disaster."}
{3: 'The medal looks completely handmade, with "Ultimate Racing Champion" handwritten on it.'}
{3: 'Rather than showing any disdain, Bridget accepts the medal with visible excitement.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Thanks!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Amazing work! You want to join the Science Council someday, right? I'd say you've got a good shot!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Male Student', 3: 'Thank you so much!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After the racing game, you and Bridget head toward the other side of the festival.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory196.png'}
{3: 'An excited crowd rushes past you. Their loud chatter and laughter echo in the air.'}
{3: "You stand on tiptoe to get a better view and spot a lottery drawing nearby that's about to announce its winners."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: '【kuroname】, shall we try our luck at the lottery too?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Do you know what the prizes are?', 3: '100'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Umm... no, I have no idea.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Isn't it more exciting when you don't know what's coming?", 4: '1'}
{2: "We don't know if we'll win, or what we might win...", 3: '104'}
{2: "Doesn't that make it even more exciting?", 3: '105'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Exactly! Great minds think alike!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "The mystery is what makes it fun! If we knew what the prizes were, we'd just get caught up in calculating their worth!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: '"I don\'t really want this," or "I could probably get this cheaper somewhere else"...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'You will have all these negative thoughts in your head.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "But when it's a complete surprise, you'll be happy with whatever you get!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "And if you're lucky enough to get something that's worth a lot, you'll feel happy for days!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You continue your conversation as you arrive at the lottery stall.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Student Vendor', 3: "Welcome! You're just in time for the raffle. Would you two like to try your luck?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Two lottery tickets, please.', 3: '116'}
{2: 'Student Vendor', 3: 'Sure, here you are!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The vendor takes the money and hands over two lottery tickets.'}
{2: 'Student Vendor', 3: 'Now please watch the big screen to see the results—?!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The student slams the button, and a dramatic jingle sounds as colorful numbers rapidly fly across the screen.'}
{2: 'Student Vendor', 3: "Oh! Congratulations! One of your tickets didn't win anything, but the other one got you—the Sweet Fortune Prize!", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Student Vendor', 3: "And the prize is—a Couple's Explorer Pass! With this, you can either get a guided tour of the F.O.S. Military College, or a chance to watch Support Force's daily training session!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wait, who came up with this?!', 3: '124'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Bridget slaps her forehead.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'On second thought, we do have these events sometimes... And I guess civilians would find our daily routine fascinating, especially students from the Education District.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Student Vendor', 3: "Could you two please come up to the stage? We'll take a photo together.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Student Vendor', 3: 'The photo will be sent to both the F.O.S. Military College and Support Force, and will be printed on your passes as verification.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'At that moment, all eyes fall on Bridget and you.'}
{3: 'You can feel the burning stares without even turning your head.'}
{2: 'Refuse.', 3: '137', 4: 'Decline firmly.', 5: '137', 6: 'Turn it down with unwavering resolve.', 7: '137'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'We would like to give our prize to the next participant!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget suddenly realizes that she can transfer the damage.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Student Vendor', 3: "Huh? But you'll have to give up your prizes? I suppose you could do that...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Student Vendor', 3: "But at least take a photo with us! It's such a special moment!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Ahaha, about that...', 4: '1'}
{2: "Oh no, the movie's about to start!", 3: '147'}
{3: 'You suddenly blurt out the lamest excuse.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Oh... ah, yeah, right! We're running late. We need to get going now!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget quickly nods along.'}
{3: 'You and Bridget bolt off from the raffle area before the student can say anything else.'}
